name: Tag World Roots
description:
A fantasy game in a World where bird creatures raise human children as their teachers/mentors. It plays like a simulation game where you run activities, form social relationships with the students, and navigate a daily schedule full of random events. 

Your goal is to become a successful Bird-in-Training and earn enough skills to become the Master Bird!

We created this for the Global Game Jam 2023. The entire game and all of its artwork were created in a single weekend by Steve Rakar and Michelle Rakar.

The theme this year was "Roots", so we went with a game about Tag World.

NOTE: This game will be updated soon with some minor bug fixes! Stay tuned!
